subject: docs(claude): add commit message format guidelines to CLAUDE.md
body:
Adds a new "Commit Message Format" section under HARD RULES defining
required metadata footers for all commits, including Tags, Complexity,
Urgency, Impact, Risk, Debt, Epic, and Semver fields.

Tags: documentation, developer-experience, standards
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 2
Impact: internal
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: commit-guidelines
Semver: patch

https://claude.ai/code/session_016EPk4gasTdNpc5yAyNGkUy
title: add commit message format guidelines to CLAUDE.md
